reviews.review: i haven't played this game since 2014. its just as beautiful as i remember. amazing game 10/10
ОЧЕНЬ ПРИКОЛЬНАЯ ИГРА И КАЧЕСТВО ВСЕМ СОВЕТУЮ

和一代相比画质进步很多，玩法和一代相比完美继承，对于没有玩过一代的建议先去玩一代。
二代加入了联机和实验室功能，地图更加丰富，有些地图甚至比原版的都有趣。
Este juego tiene muy buenos puzzles y una historia muy interesante. Lo recomiendo a las personas a las que les gustan los puzzles.
В первой Части Глэдос Давила на нервый говорила что ГГ не что, и все такое а во второй часте это уже делает ваш друг в режиме Мультиплеера ( Кто напишет " Научись писать " Мне пох на ваше мнение )
ta gra jest kozak :P ta fabuła i zakończenie i co-op jeszcze broń portalowa ta fizyka portalowa :D raz dałem portal pod podajnik żelu gra za kozacka
Un juegazo para disfrutar con mi buen pana Miguel
Nice graphic, nice story, very good test labs, good cliffchanger, source is amazing!
"Speedy thing goes in, Speedy thing goes out" -my ex
Ich fand das Portal 1 zu steril ist aber Portal 2 war eine neue Erfahrung aber eine gute .
Horas y horas de entretenimiento y la historia exquisita
This game is a puzzle solving game as you (chell) explore a dangerous lab named aperature science
fun and i like the story.
Tremenedamente recomendable, una joya que no envejece mal.

단순 오렌지 박스 자리가 남아서 만든 하프라이프 외전이 당당하게  시리즈로 분리 된 작품. 
과학적인 예술작품을 보여준다.
You'll know when the test starts.

This game is and has been my favorite game since I got it in 2011, the replay value is immense and the puzzles are creative and genuinely take time to solve. The story is equally enthralling and one of the best Valve has conjured.
Amazing. It's lighting, Sound, and other gaming aspects are out of this world. Especially after nine years. The writing is absolutely phenomenal aswell. The comedy is hilarious too.
Ha, ha funny wheater man be like not idot
great puzzle game pretty much one of my favorite games
this game is so good! its even better than the first game! its such a good game how you have to use your brain and skills at the same time!
Impresionante, me encanto, desafiante, para pensar pero divertido, y la historia de forndo me encanto, fue muy divertido.
Amazing game. Much more immersive than the last game with interesting expansions on the lore.
Buen juego, me lo pase muy bien y la historia es bastante entretenida
What can i say other than you really need this game if you're looking for a good puzzle game and/or you're new to steam.
This is amazing. The story keeps you thrilled, and you never get bored.
CLASSIC. Aside from the loading screens basically timeless.
Одна из лучших игр-головоломок, с великолепным и очень интересным сюжетом.
Uzaylıların yaptıgına eminim ama kanıtlayamam harika bir oyun keşke 2 kişiden daha fazla kişiyle oynanabilse.

this game is very fun and things and i like the portal thingys very good. there was a bad mod in space engineers of portal 2  but otherwise i really liked that game too. i really like the portals, very creative!. and yeah guys i really liked the portals great work there people. i would like a portal 3 and i hope you keep the portals in portal 3.
I LOVE THIS GAME SO MUCH
Portals what more could you want

Everything the original Portal did right was done even better in this game. It has a solid story and very satisfying puzzle mechanics. Top it all off with some great OST and hilarious voice acting and you've got yourself a 10/10 game here.

i really like science and the concept of portals really excites me, though, somnething that has bugged me, is the language options, sometimes the captions are in my language, (norwegian) then suddenly they're not, so jeg can have the announcer talking english in the captions, then wheatley comes in and talks norwegian, and suddenly he doesn't! this problme has been around since about when i started playing the game, (i think 2015)
The best puzzle game ever. I still cannot believe that it was made in 2011.

Вот бы в коопе поиграть...

I love every thing about it the only thing i dislike about it is the amount of loading screens the game has.
Das Spiel ist relativ gut für ein Spiel aus 2011 ich kann es nur weiterempfehlen die Grafik ist außerdem top
Норм игра, понравилась. Не зря потратил деньги.
у вас есть лишнее время и нервные клетки? Если да - дерзайте
It is great. Nothing more to say
Einfach genial, auch wenn das Spiel schon uralt ist!!!
Nothing comes close to the brilliance of the first Portal. This is as good a sequel as you could hope for though, and it's worth your time and money.
